channel_description: Don’t miss Ash’s continuing adventures through the Kalos region in Pokémon the Series: XY Kalos Quest, now on Pokémon TV!
channel_name: Pokémon the Series: XY Kalos Quest

media.description: After a squabble between friends, a chance meeting gives our heroes a chance for some unexpected teamwork!
media.title: Pathways to Performance Partnering!

media.description: After Ash makes a mistake, his Hawlucha finds itself in the performance of a lifetime!
media.title: When Light and Dark Collide!

media.description: Before Ash’s Cyllage City Gym battle, a visit to the Muraille Coast sets our heroes on an aquatic adventure filled with undersea Pokémon!
media.title: An Undersea Place to Call Home!

media.description: After running into a friend, our heroes embark upon an adventure filled with stealth and surprise!
media.title: A Stealthy Challenge!

media.description: A visit to a Skiddo ranch provides our heroes with some unexpected challenges!
media.title: A Race for Home!

media.description: The entire world is in danger, and an unlikely group of longtime foes must join forces to save it!
media.title: Facing the Grand Design!

media.description: A chance encounter with a Pokémon in need leads our heroes into an unexpected adventure!
media.title: A Slippery Encounter!

media.description: The newest member of our heroes’ Pokémon family is in trouble, but their smallest member steps in to help!
media.title: One for the Goomy!

media.description: Our heroes have arrived in Coumarine City, where they’re immediately confronted by a crisis with bone-chilling consequences!
media.title: Thawing an Icy Panic!

media.description: The time for Ash’s Coumarine City Gym battle is here, and with it the chance to learn and grow!
media.title: The Green, Green Grass-Types of Home!

media.description: A Coumarine City tradition is in jeopardy, and our heroes are faced with averting a major crisis!
media.title: Under the Pledging Tree!

media.description: It’s Serena’s Pokémon Showcase debut, surrounded by friends and rivals, old and new!
media.title: A Showcase Debut!

media.description: There’s a bully in the Lumiose Badlands, and many helpless Pokémon are depending on our heroes for their freedom!
media.title: An Oasis of Hope!

media.description: When the Kalos Power Plant is held under siege, the safety of Lumiose City and many Pokémon hangs in the balance!
media.title: The Future Is Now, Thanks to Determination!

media.description: A conflict of heartfelt emotions threatens the future of a longstanding partnership!
media.title: A Fork in the Road! A Parting of the Ways!

media.description: A chance meeting with a mystery Pokémon performer provides Serena and her Pokémon with some priceless advice and support!
media.title: Battling with Elegance and a Big Smile!

media.description: A surprise reunion with an old friend gives Ash the perfect opportunity for training—and even more surprises!
media.title: Good Friends, Great Training!

media.description: Ash is finally in Lumiose City for his Gym battle with Clemont, but a major crisis threatens the proceedings!
media.title: Confronting the Darkness!

media.description: The long-awaited Gym battle between Ash and Gym Leader Clemont is off and running, and lots of intense training is being put to the test!
media.title: The Moment of Lumiose Truth!

media.description: When our heroes visit Professor Sycamore on their way out of Lumiose City, they’re in for a surprise of mega proportions!
media.title: Garchomp’s Mega Bond!

media.description: When Ash’s Goodra encounters an old friend, our heroes take a journey to learn about its mysterious past!
media.title: Defending the Homeland!

media.description: With Goodra’s beloved wetlands in imminent danger, our heroes are faced with a must-win situation for the sake of the many Pokémon who live there!
media.title: Beyond the Rainbow!

media.description: The daily fortune in Serena’s guidebook predicts a bad day for our heroes…and that prediction turns out to be accurate!
media.title: So You’re Having a Bad Day!

media.description: A rainy night and an old mansion combine to give our heroes an evening to remember—or not!
media.title: Scary Hospitality!

media.description: Our heroes have arrived in Laverre City, and the Gym Leader there has a wardrobe of surprises in store!
media.title: A Fashionable Battle!

media.description: Ash is ready to battle Valerie at the Laverre Gym, and it appears thinking on his feet could be our hero’s key to victory!
media.title: Fairy-Type Trickery!

media.description: After Ash’s fierce battle with Valerie at the Laverre Gym, young Sawyer has a lot of questions!
media.title: Rivals: Today and Tomorrow!

media.description: A chance discovery on their way to Anistar City gives our heroes a challenging teaching moment!
media.title: A Not-So-Flying Start!

media.description: When our heroes come upon an aerial Pokémon race, their newest member gets a chance to spread its wings!
media.title: A Relay in the Sky!

media.description: A tour of the Poké Ball Factory provides our heroes with much more than just Poké Balls!
media.title: A Frenzied Factory Fiasco!

media.description: Serena’s next Pokémon Showcase appearance is taking place in Dendemille Town, and she’s faced with some stiff competition!
media.title: Performing with Fiery Charm!

media.description: A visit to a peculiar hotel gives our heroes the chance to right a wrong from long ago!
media.title: Rotom's Wish!

media.description: During a visit to a popular festival, our heroes fall victim to several cases of mistaken identity!
media.title: A Festival Trade! A Festival Farewell?

media.description: A trip over a snow-covered mountain gives our heroes the chance to truly help those in need!
media.title: Over the Mountain of Snow!

media.description: When the power goes out at a Pokémon Center, our heroes and their Pokémon charge in to help!
media.title: Adventures in Running Errands!

media.description: A crisis in confidence leads to renewed strength and determination!
media.title: Mending a Broken Spirit!

media.description: A chance reunion with an old friend gives our heroes an experience of legendary proportions!
media.title: A Legendary Photo Op!

media.description: Bonnie and friends rescue a little Tyrunt...at least until Team Rocket strikes again!
media.title: The Tiny Caretaker!

media.description: An emergency situation offers the perfect opportunity to recall a heartwarming story of times past!
media.title: A Trip Down Memory Train!

media.description: A beautiful meadow provides our heroes with the perfect spot to take a break and witness a surprising performance!
media.title: A Frolicking Find in the Flowers!

media.description: A masterpiece is in the making, and our heroes can’t wait to be involved!
media.title: Lights! Camera! Pika!

media.description: A friendly Tag Battle provides Eevee and Serena with some confidence—and inspiration!
media.title: Tag Team Inspiration!

media.description: It’s time for the Anistar City Pokémon Showcase, and a second Princess Key hangs in the balance for Serena!
media.title: A Performance Pop Quiz!

media.description: As our heroes look to Ash’s next battle at the Anistar City Gym, they discover things about its Gym Leader they never could have imagined!
media.title: Cloudy Fate, Bright Future!

media.description: The time for Ash’s Anistar City Gym battle has arrived, but in this case, time has some unexpected meanings!
media.title: All Eyes on the Future!
